sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of paroxetine with buspirone in the treatment of depression.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨丁螺环酮与帕罗西汀联合治疗抑郁症的效果。

sentences.english: Psychiatrists say serious depression may have been the main reason for the killing.
sentences.chinese: 严重的抑郁症可能是她犯案的主要原因之一。

sentences.english: These hypothesized functions for PPD are far from proved.
sentences.chinese: 这些对于产后抑郁症作用的假设还远未得到证实。

sentences.english: To investigate the distribution and frequency of symptoms in manic- depressive disorder.
sentences.chinese: 目的调查住院躁狂和抑郁症的症状分布和频度。

sentences.english: Duloxetine is also effective in the treatment of comorbid chronic pain in de- pression.
sentences.chinese: 对于抑郁症伴发慢性疼痛也有一定的疗效。

sentences.english: Depression can not eat anything in the context of the contraband liquor is the most stringent.
sentences.chinese: 在抑郁症不能吃什么的范围内，酒类是最严格的禁品。

sentences.english: Objective To compare the curative effects and safety of trazodone vs.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较曲唑酮与氟西汀治疗抑郁症的疗效及安全性。

sentences.english: A dysregulated RA metabolism and signaling was also found in the hypothalamus of a rat model for depression.
sentences.chinese: 在抑郁症大鼠模型中，RA代谢和信号通路失调。

sentences.english: Some men ended up with a male equivalent of postnatal depression, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他说，有些男人也患上了产后抑郁症。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy and safety of reboxetine in the treatment of patients with depression in old age.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察瑞波西汀治疗老年抑郁症的疗效和安全性。

sentences.english: But isolating yourself can only worsenthose depressive symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 但是孤立自己只会加重抑郁症状。

sentences.english: To discuss the treatment to post-apoplexy depression with acupuncture of strengthening brain and regulating mind.
sentences.chinese: 探讨健脑调神针法对中风后抑郁症的治疗作用。

sentences.english: Bubl believes that a similar technique could be used to aid diagnosis of clinical depression.
sentences.chinese: 巴布认为相似技术可用于临床抑郁症的诊断。

sentences.english: Objective To explore change of sleep electroencephalography in depressions with physical anxiety.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨躯体焦虑性抑郁症病人的睡眠脑电图改变。

sentences.english: Molecular techniques such as gene knockout partially support the monoamine theory of depression.
sentences.chinese: 诸如基因部分敲除的分子技术支持抑郁症的单胺理论。

sentences.english: Sleep apnea can also cause depression-like symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠窒息也能导致似抑郁症的症状。
